value.title: Explaining what a Lakehouse is!
value.excerpt: You've probably heard the term lakehouse with various services like Azure Synapse Analytics. But what actually is a lakehouse? value.title: Exploring Microsoft Purview for data governance
value.excerpt: You've probably heard of Microsoft Purview somewhere. Buck Woody joins Patrick to highlight how Microsoft Purview can help you with data governance.
